author: dzhuliana
title: Bring more women to Cardano
description: To make the world work better for all, our community must reflect the diversity of the world. Less than 5% of the community are women.
solution: Bringing more women into the Cardano network and improving participation of women within Catalyst proposals through mentorship.
experience: Founders of an existing global women mentorship programme with a matchmaking engine. In collaboration with other Cardano proposers and AIM.
